name: Rubberecycle
tag_list: rubberecycle-mulch, playground-rubber-mulch, playground-safety, playground-surfaces, rubber-playgrounds, playground, gardening, landscaping, rubber-footing, environment, tire-mulch, recycled-tires, colored-rubber-mulch, crumb-rubber, shredded-tires, rubbe
description: Rubber recycle creates rubber mulch whic
overview:
Rubberecyle manufactures a unique granule rubber product that consumers love. Produced from 100% recycled tires, Rubberecycle’s rubber mulch is safe, economical, and environment friendly.

Playground Rubber Mulch

Safety- The most important factor to consider when installing a playground is the surface. Rubber mulch is the playground surface that is the most effective in preventing injuries. Independent studies clearly indicate that playground rubber mulch vastly outperforms other safety surfaces in absorbing impact. Our unique product consists of granular rubber particles rather than shredded rubber, significantly increasing its shock-absorbing properties. Unlike wood mulch, playground rubber mulch retains its cushiony softness year round, and will not freeze during the winter months. Our product is completely non-toxic and meets federal flammability standards, so parents can breathe easily while their kids have a great time.

Durability- Rubberecycleâ€™s cutting-edge technology allows us to produce granular rubber particles as opposed to conventional shredded rubber. Thatâ€™s why playground rubber mulch does not compress or decompose. Its consistency and sponginess will endure for a lifetime. Furthermore due to the superior quality of its size and shape, playground rubber mulch stays in place even in very windy conditions. Our painted rubber mulch is completely colorfast, impervious to the effects of all weather conditions.

Practicality- Playground rubber mulch is virtually maintenance free. It drains and dries rapidly after rains, and actually reduces residual dust and mud. Its granular rubber particles are odor-free, non-staining and non-abrasive. The size and shape are aesthetically pleasing, and rubber mulch is available in a variety of colors to suit your playground needs.

Value- Playground rubber mulch is considerably less expensive than other playground surfaces such as mats or poured in place covers. Since it will not need to be replaced; due to its exceptional durability, it is absolutely the most cost effective playground surface available. Discover why schools, parks, and homeowners across the country have made playground rubber mulch their choice for a durable, safe and economic playground surface.

Landscape Rubber Mulch

Our rubber mulch is also available for your home and garden, keeping them beautiful all year. It is cost effective since it will never need to be replaced, it minimizes dust and will not breed insects or termites. Landscape rubber mulch has a low maintenance and will stay in place, it is also guaranteed to retain its rich tones for many years.

In 1996, Rubberecycle introduced top quality rubber surfacing products to the military, commercial and residential markets. Rubberecycle pioneered the tire recycling industry, utilizing the most advanced technology and equipment to process scrap tires on site. Today, Rubberecycle continues to provide their customers with quality rubber surfacing directly from their own plant. Bypassing the middleman, Rubberecycle offers the highest quality products for the most competitive prices. Add in superlative service and solid reliability, Rubberecyle holds the gold standard in the tire recycling industry.

Surefoot Protective Footing

Our Surefoot protective footing is available to help build, upgrade or revitalize your equestrian arena. It is dust and odor-free, handles moisture efficiently and provides good traction for your horses. It can be used independently, blended with sand or combined with other surface material. Surefoot requires minimum maintenance, lasts a lifetime and helps your horses perform better.
